item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar and restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Cuban Revolution on Aborn st in downtown Providence

Wow! Its been ages since we've been to Cuban Revolution downtown, so here we go! Cuban Revolution offers a spirited counter-culture environment reminiscent of a 1960s coffee house with the passion of a Latin beat... all wrapped up in a swanky setting that propels you back in time. The location downtown is a little cozier than the one over in Olneyville, but perfect for a Monday night! Its been awhile so, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Bonnie is hosting this one, please look at her picture!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Cuban Revolution (downtown)!
